tweets.text:
We've launched a new roadmap to hit our net zero target by 2030 by reducing our carbon emissions by 45% üåç

Read our plan: https://t.co/AfenQc0C4u

#TogetherForOurPlanet #NetZero https://t.co/pE7ql2Paxe

Thank you @SarahInNUL for compiling this. @EnvAgencyMids, please can you explain what technical, legal or financial challenges are unique to Walleys Quarry Landfill that prevent you from taking the same enforcement action? We're an understanding bunch, we just want to know why. https://t.co/yBdiMmY6Ag

@JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 The gasses are pungent and offensive to mind and body, but also the sight/ site of it is horrendous. This beautiful country town has been sanctioned by @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK as a waste site. @KeeleUniversity suffers, the people of @NewsNBC suffer. Visit us ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§

This morning NUL was rank. Now my garden is rank. My head thumps. My air is rancid, thick, dense, toxic, filthy and poisonous. @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @MrNickKnowles @JuliaBradbury @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @MattHancock But apparently the @EnvAgency has no legal authority.

tweets.text:
Floating pennywort is an invasive plant that costs the economy at least ¬£25 million a year.

To tackle this, we have teamed up with @AnglingTrust, @BritishCanoeing and an army of local volunteers, to leave floating pennywort with nowhere to hide. 

‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/NCESUYazJc https://t.co/YpvN7pBbbo

Bollin Gr #Prestbury remains closed as we repair the retaining wall. Recent heavy rainfall caused the dam to overspill onto the rd so we‚Äôre working with the @EnvAgency to restore a safe area to complete the repair & have added measures incl more pumps to manage quantity of water

@EnvAgencyMids You suspended Clayton Hall Landfill‚Äôs permit when they had similar problems,which focused the operators efforts to fixing the odour issues.Why can‚Äôt this be done at Walley‚Äôs?The councillor said that was the single biggest action that made a difference #stopthestink

@StinkStopthe @sunnyraisin62 @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency No more talking @ClareDinnisEA you've had years for that, we want action right now this minute, dirty nappy pizza is for I'm a celebrity not tea in Newcastle  u Lyme. No one should live like this,purifier can't cope tonight, shut that place down, enough is enough.

tweets.text: @JuliaBradbury @Laura_James88 @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @EnvAgency Thank you for pushing on with this Julia. It really is difficult expressing just how horrific this situation is. It impacts me everyday. It actually sticks to material so I often smell it on my furniture even when it doesn‚Äôt smell in the air! It‚Äôs absolutely foul. #stopthestink

Work is ongoing on the #Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme - in Romney Gardens the flood walls are now being built. 

Elsewhere, we are undertaking ground investigation works with a road closure needed for the next few days in Burneside.

Details visit https://t.co/F4fe5jNVEN https://t.co/a6swKZZlPs

I just drove through the area on Saturday and the stench is shocking and unbelievable! I couldn't live with that and you shouldn't have to. @EnvAgency where are you and why can't you put a stop to this! https://t.co/azbbGitwyY

urls.title: Partnership created to enhance the environment in Pitsford for both water quality and wildlife | Anglian Water Services
urls.description: Anglian Water has joined in partnership with the Freshwater Habitats Trust and the Environment Agency to launch a five-year project aimed at enhancing natural habitats and biodiversity across farmland in Pitsford.

tweets.text:
The Water Friendly Farming project is an exciting new partnership with farmers around Pitsford Water, Northampton to protect nature and water quality üí¶üë©‚Äçüåæüêüüåøüê∏ 
Find out how we'll be working with @EnvAgency and @PondRiverStream  https://t.co/tibqPCLurB
